sentence: “You have a chance today to put fear into the heart of Dr. Oz, and Dave McCormick, and that whole cast of characters because they don’t want to run against Conor Lamb,” he said, referring to the top two candidates seeking the Republican Senate nomination.
author: Daniel Marans
title: Pennsylvania Democrats Decline To Endorse In Senate Primary

sentence: There, disgraced TV physician Dr. Mehmet Oz is gunning hard to close a 9-point gap between himself and former George W. Bush administration official Dave McCormick.
title: Pennsylvania is ground zero for 2022’s ugliest Senate races

title: The race for the Pennsylvania U.S. Senate seat: A guide

sentence: Although Pennsylvania’s TV airwaves have been filled with ads from Republican candidates Mehmet Oz and Dave McCormick attacking each other, the discourse on the air had been more civilized on the Democratic side.
author: Robert Farley
title: Pro-Lamb Super PAC Misfires in Attack Ad Against Fetterman

sentence: The major Republican candidates are commentator Kathy Barnette, real estate developer Jeff Bartos, Philadelphia attorney George Bochetto, former hedge fund CEO Dave Mccormick, physician and TV personality Dr. Mehmet Oz and Carla Sands, who served as President Donald Trump's ambassador to Denmark.
author: Tom Kertscher
title: "John Fetterman's a self-described democratic socialist."
